column1: Local Foods////Great sandwich shop. I had the Banh Mi
column3: cucumber and jalapeno on French baguette. I've been wanting to try Banh Mi so this was my first. I can't compare to other versions but this is a great sandwich
column4: from the ingredients to the awesome bread. I had two sides - kale salad (with pignolis
column10: with a curry dressing). The kale was excellent
column11: the 4-bean very good but not special.
